    • updateMovieById

      public boolean updateMovieById(int option, int movieID, Object newValue)
      Iterate through all the movies and update the object with new values
      Parameters:
      option - to choose what attribute of movie to update
      movieID - to choose which movie to update
      newValue - is the new value used to update the movie
      Returns:
      true if movie is updated. False if movie was not updated

    • removeMovieByID

      public boolean removeMovieByID(int movieID)
      Iterate through all the movies and remove the object
      Parameters:
      movieID - is the unique identifier for movie
      Returns:
      true if movie was removed. False otherwise.

    • addRating

      public boolean addRating(int movieID, String customerName, int numRating, String comments)
      Insert a new rating for a movie into the movie database
      Parameters:
      movieID - is identifier for movie
      customerName - name of customer
      numRating - rating that customer wants to give
      comments - from customer
      Returns:
      true if review was added. False if invalid file name

    • addTotalSales

      public boolean addTotalSales(int movieID, int totalSales)
      Insert a totalSales for a movie into the movie database
      Parameters:
      movieID - the id of movie
      totalSales - the total profit earned from movie
      Returns:
      true if movie sales is successfully update. False if filename was invalid

    • assignCinemaToMovie

      public boolean assignCinemaToMovie(int movieID, Cinema cinema)
      Insert cinema that is broadcasting the movie into the movie database
      Parameters:
      movieID - is unique id of movie
      cinema - is cinema to broadcast the movie
      Returns:
      true if movie sucessfully assigned to cinema. false if filename is invalid.
